mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, FAV_TEAM_ID) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{favTeamId})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId, PASSWORD as userPw, NAME as userName, NICKNAME as nickName, EMAIL, PHONE, FAV_TEAM_ID as favTeamId, AUTH, WARNING_CNT as warningCnt, BAN_UNTIL as banUntil FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
